Profile

About Belinda

Web engineer focused on performant, accessible builds for agencies and growth-minded business owners.

Principles

A framework for every engagement

Years inside agencies, in-house teams, and as an independent partner taught me what keeps projects calm and on track.

01

Systems thinking

Tool-agnostic component libraries and documentation so any contributor can jump in without guessing.

02

Accessibility first

Keyboard flows, semantic markup, and content guidance are baked into the base scope, not add-ons.

03

Transparent ops

Loom walkthroughs, shared decision logs, and weekly recaps keep everyone aligned asynchronously.

Working style

An iterative, collaborative working style

I work in short cycles with regular check-ins so progress is visible early and often. Rather than spending weeks designing or building in isolation, I prefer a back-and-forth process that prioritizes the most important outcomes first.

This approach helps teams get real results quickly, adjust direction as needed, and avoid investing time in work that doesn’t serve the goal.

For ongoing or open-ended engagements, I share updates as work approaches agreed thresholds so clients can make informed decisions about scope, priorities, or next steps — without surprises.

Background

Engineering roots with
decades of applied problem-solving

My work is shaped by a long arc that starts in engineering, moves through entrepreneurship, and ultimately settles in modern web systems. I bring structured thinking, production discipline, and real-world business context to every build — whether I’m working with an agency team or independently with a business owner.

  • 1993 Engineering career focused on quality systems
    and custom SQL/database applications for manufacturing teams.
  • 1999 Deepened web development skills while building
    and maintaining websites for small businesses alongside engineering work.
  • 2007 Founded and led a custom product business
    covering design, ecommerce, automation, SEO, and platform strategy.
  • 2020 Agency-based web development delivering production
    WordPress sites, design systems, and performance-focused builds.
  • 2023 Independent web engineering and consulting for agencies
    and growth-minded businesses, focused on accessible, maintainable sites.
